info.+content: Eijun Sawamura is a pitcher who joins an elite school with a brilliant catcher named Kazuya Miyuki. Together with the rest of the team, they strive for Japan's storied Koushien championships through hard work and determination.
#1: "Go EXCEED!!" by Tom-H@ck featuring Masayoshi Ōishi
#2: "Perfect Hero" by Tom-H@ck featuring Masayoshi Ōishi
#3: "Hashire! Mirai" (疾走れ！ミライ; Run Ahead Toward the Future!) by GLAY
#4: "CLOUD NINE" by Seidō High School Baseball Team
#5: "PROMISED FIELD" by Ryota Ohsaka, Nobunaga Shimazaki, & Natsuki Hanae
#6: "FINAL VICTORY" by Seidō High School Baseball Team
TVアニメ「ダイヤのA」スペシャルサイト
テレビ東京・あにてれ ダイヤのA
